notes: Rebrand to Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server; per-user data directory (%LOCALAPPDATA%\Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server\data). Fix PyInstaller tray spec/launcher and include kenpo_words.json. | Step 2: pre_build pulls local data when present, backs up root\data, stages packaging\build_data; build_exe prefers packaging\build_data when newer; adds repo+local build logs. | Step 3: add build_data source flag; build_exe uses build_data only when flagged; after successful build, backup root\data then replace from build_data for next package seeding; move local builder log to %LOCALAPPDATA%\Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server\log\Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server logs\. | Step 4: Update install uses local data (local wins); seed missing files only; safe overwrite reference files if packaged newer; backup on update and auto backups (keep 10); tray restart relaunches; startup + background (scheduled task) toggles; logs moved to %LOCALAPPDATA%\Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server\log\Advanced Flashcards WebApp Server logs\.
